title: "Solution to balance Vayne" I open the thread "Delete her"
body:
Seriously, stop with that shit. I am totally in favor of nerfs for {{champion:67}} and a bunch of other champions like {{champion:92}}, and by no means I create threads with a title that would mislead you into believing that there are actual points written about why those champions should be nerfed, only to see that the actual content is just "Delete her/him".

Those threads do not explain why those champions are broken and serve just to spam the boards. You can hate a champion, but if you think that this champion is broken, at least provide a reasonable explanation to why.

Major issue with Vayne is her passive % max hp true damage, as it should deal higher damage against tanks than squishes, yet it works otherwise.

The problem is that % max hp true damage is as effective against squishies than against tanks. However it also has a flat true damage component. Not to mention, Vayne still has her normal auto-attacks, as well as Blade of the Ruined King passive. So basically she ends up murdering squishies while killing tanks. And squishies will actually die faster tanks because they are, well... squishies.

> [{quoted}](name=YumaS2Astral,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cpVaFEYg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-27T04:54:54.824+0000)

And squishies will actually die faster tanks because they are, well... squishies.

Not to mention how she lifesteals it all back because..well..bork.

(I'm not sure if the true damage portion gets absorbed too as lifesteal, but if it does, then that's just too broken.)

Delete her max hp%, make it current hp magic damage or something, so she's actually in-line with other adcs.

If you replace her max hp% with magic damage, you'd better be ready for some numbers buffs because Kog'maw does magic %hp damage... but 6% PER HIT, as opposed to 8% + base every 3 as it is for Vayne. 

Just doing a straight damage-type shift and no other buffs would literally gut her - she is balanced around Silver Bolts - Silver Bolts is the main part of her identity. Vayne busts tanks, period. 

Plus, if you make it into magic damage then you, again, make it more effective against squishies who aren't going to be building much magic resistance as compared to a tank who will have at least 150-175.

No, then she sucks hard.

%health true damage is fine on her kit. It gives her a tankbusting mechanic that isn't more effective against squishies the way that %health physical or magical damage tends to be. The flat true damage on it could arguably be lowered to decrease her effectiveness against squishes, but there is nothing wrong with her the % value. It's a good mechanic for fulfilling her role, and she does have kit weaknesses to make up for it (she's a bit too strong right now, but it can't be denied that she does lack a lot of things other AD carries have, and those absences can be exploited against her).

Yes, I know you can't build to directly counter it. No, that isn't a problem. You can still build against the majority of her damage with armor. You can build against all of her damage with attack speed slows. You can counter Vayne with actual counter play instead of just counter building, and counter play is by far the more important trait to have.

Also, to answer your question, the true damage does not proc lifesteal. It's an ability effect, not on-hit damage, so lifesteal won't apply to it. As a general rule, lifesteal only applies to autoattacks and physical on-hit effects unless otherwise noted.
